name: Fashion Dress Up
description:
★ Fashion design is extremely important today, so fashion stylists play a crucial role when it comes to trendy style and dressing items. In our Fashion App "Fashion Dress Up" , free app for mobile and tablets, your job is dedicated to cute designer dresses and beauty queen makeover while learning how to dress up for party. Our dress up App will develop your fashion sense and give you the coolest beauty tips, so that dress design will come completely natural to you in the end

★ it's One of the best Fashion and dress up games in 2016 is from our princess dress up games collection, a game called Princess Dress up Fashion . We all know that all girls have a favorite princess or a doll that look like an ice princess and of course that all girls want for their princess doll to be in fashion trends . Now you have your own fashion studio and you can dress up your princess as you like.

★ Let's start with shirts or blouses, there are so many fashion clothes to choose, so you can dress up princess and make her looks like you, with a red or green t shirt ! After that the pants or skirts will be the next dresses for your princess !The shoes cannot missing from all princess games and now you have elegant shoes or boots ! Create your own princess and help her to get best look like Cinderella ,barbie, or other princesses

★ An ice queen wants also some elegant accessories, isn't it? Like purse or necklaces or a fancy hat ! Do not forget earrings or other jewelry for princess dress up games because your doll will look like a real princess . All fashion experts know that hairstyle is very important ! Choose for your princess doll various hairstyles and you can try more colors like blonde hair or brown hair or what you like . Do not forget that she must look very pretty ! After that you have a big closet to choose various and colorful dresses for your princess doll.

★ Modern clothing items ★
✓ Tops – lovely blouses, T-shirts, shirts, corsets
✓ Bottoms – attractive skirts, jeans, pants, shorts, leggings
✓ Shoes – high heels and flats
✓ Dresses – stylish dresses for every occasion

★ Accessories ★
✓ Earrings
✓ Necklaces
✓ Sunglasses
✓ Bracelets
✓ Belts
✓ Bags – clutch bags, envelope bags and many others

★ Features:
✓ Beautiful HD illustrations joined with a rich narrative on every page
✓ Help a fashion doll get ready for a trip to the mall.
✓ Choose outfits, clothes, shoes and trendy bags.
✓ Pick out the perfect dress for her to wear.
✓ Complete fashion doll makeovers at your fingertips!
✓ Enjoy numerous engaging and fun animations on each page.

★ We hope that you love our fashion games and you like to play this kind of dress up games . Please tell us your opinion about it and if you like please rate it !
